Description :
        Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.---**Links:**- (https://twitter.com/EN_BlueArchive)- (https://twitter.com/KR_BlueArchive)- (https://mangadex.org/title/1f63ea84-6bc6-4312-81bf-b28d5592d802/blue-archive-japan)
